forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds in the morning will give way to cloudy skies late. High 16C. SW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds in the morning will give way to cloudy skies late. High around 60F. SW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.
